title: The Amazing Octopus
description: An octopus is an amazing animal with many surprising traits. They can regrow arms, swim backwards, and even squirt ink! The Amazing Octopus provides students with a comprehensive look at these fascinating eight-armed ocean animals. This book can also be used to teach students how to determine the main idea and details as well as the proper use of adjectives.
meta: blend, hatch, predators, prey, squirt, venom
Main Idea and Details : Determine main idea and details
Initial and Final Blends : Discriminate initial consonant bl-blend
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word many

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
